title: NVIDIA unveils Blackwell architecture to power next GenAI wave
description:
NVIDIA has announced its next-generation Blackwell GPU architecture, designed to usher in a new era of accelerated computing and enable organisations to build and run real-time generative AI on trillion-parameter large language models. The Blackwell platform promises up to 25 times lower cost and energy consumption compared to its predecessor: the Hopper architecture. Named after... Read more »

The post NVIDIA unveils Blackwell architecture to power next GenAI wave  appeared first on AI News.
